metadata.name: Stand By Me
metadata.description:
This is my first edition piece, and I have created it in support of Ukraine during this terrible time.  
100% of the primary sale profits will go to Direct Relief (the highest rated charity aiding Ukraine relief efforts).  
Donations will be made when the sales of this reach 50% and 100%. 

If you follow my work, you will know that I love wildlife. This made it an obvious choice to use one of my favourite wildlife images for this special edition piece!

Zebras are courageous and are not afraid to confront predators.  
This image of a mother and baby zebra was taken in Amboseli National Reserve, Kenya, Africa.


PHOTOGRAPH COPYRIGHT Â© 2013 BY EMMA SAMUEL
